Class LogixPlaybackException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable

        • com.logituit.logixsdk.logixplayer.LogixPlaybackException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LogixPlaybackException
extends java.lang.Exception
    A Exception for handling the exceptions occuring in the player
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
